commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Now, μ's first-year students: Rin Hoshizora, Maki Nishikino, and Hanayo Koizumi. Please introduce yourselves!

commands.speaker: Rin
commands.line: Okay! I'm μ's Rin Hoshizora! I'm a school idol with Maki and Kayo-chin!

commands.speaker: Maki
commands.line: Hold on Rin. How is she supposed to know who you're talking about?

commands.speaker: Rin
commands.line: What? But Kayo-chin's been Kayo-chin forever! Right, Kayo-chin?

commands.speaker: Hanayo
commands.line: I'm Hanayo Koizumi. Nice to meet you!

commands.speaker: Hanayo
commands.line: I don't expect anyone to understand, but I really like it when Rin calls me that.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: I see. The two of you are good friends.

commands.speaker: Rin
commands.line: *Chuckle* I love Kayo-chin and cats and μ's, and running, too!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: (Rin has so much energy on stage but I didn't realize she always had that much energy!)

commands.speaker: Rin
commands.line: I didn't know much about school idols, but I'm glad I decided to try it out.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Hanayo, did you not know much about school idols, either?

commands.speaker: Hanayo
commands.line: I did. I've loved school idols since long before I joined μ's!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Really! I guess if you've always liked them, it makes sense that you wanted to become one.

commands.speaker: Hanayo
commands.line: At first, I never imagined becoming one. I was happy just watching them.

commands.speaker: Hanayo
commands.line: But I jumped into the school idol world with Rin. It's tough sometimes, but we're very happy!

commands.speaker: Rin
commands.line: Maki, you're next.

commands.speaker: Maki
commands.line: I'm Maki Nishikino. I write the music for μ's.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: (The heartfelt songs of μ's. Maki's the one that writes them.)

commands.speaker: Maki
commands.line: Enough about me though. I'm interested in you.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Wait, me?

commands.speaker: Maki
commands.line: I heard from Honoka that you write the music for your school idols in Nijigasaki.

commands.speaker: Rin
commands.line: Really? So you're a school idol, too?

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: I'm not a school idol myself. I play more of a support role.

commands.speaker: Hanayo
commands.line: A supporter? Sounds like a fun, worthwhile job!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: It is! I came here to learn from you guys because I respect you and want to know how you get prepared for concerts.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Oh, but I know some things might be confidential, so you don't have to tell me anything you don't want made public.

commands.speaker: Hanayo
commands.line: I see. We don't do anything we need to hide though.

commands.speaker: Maki
commands.line: That's right. I was just about to compose a new song, so why don't you come to the music room with us?

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Can I? Just like that?

commands.speaker: Rin
commands.line: Of course! That's what you came here for, right?

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Everyone... Thank you!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: (μ's composing a song... This is going to be amazing.)

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Umm, are all three of you writing it? Rin and Hanayo, do you help?

commands.speaker: Rin
commands.line: Nope, Maki is the one that writes the music.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Are those--

commands.speaker: Rin
commands.line: Do your best, Maki!

commands.speaker: Hanayo
commands.line: We're cheering for you!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Maracas?!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: (So the other two just cheer Maki on while she composes?)

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Is this always what it's like when you write songs?

commands.speaker: Maki
commands.line: Pretty much. I sometimes write by myself, but most of the time these two are with me.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: (I'd probably get distracted if people were right there while I was trying to write.)

commands.speaker: Maki
commands.line: *Giggle* It's strange to see, right?

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: I wouldn't say that. I'm just used to focusing and writing music by myself, so I'm a little surprised.

commands.speaker: Maki
commands.line: If we're talking about focus, I'm definitely better off on my own.

commands.speaker: Rin
commands.line: Hooray, hooray Maki!

commands.speaker: Hanayo
commands.line: Go, go Maki!

commands.speaker: Rin, Hanayo
commands.line: Wooo!

commands.speaker: Maki
commands.line: Having someone cheer for me doesn't necessarily mean I come up with good songs. It's not bad though.

commands.speaker: Maki
commands.line: Plus, when I play the piano like this, interesting things happen.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Interesting things?

commands.speaker: Rin
commands.line: Myaaah, myah, myah, myah!

commands.speaker: Hanayo
commands.line: Hm, hmm hm hmmm!

commands.speaker: Maki
commands.line: Lalalala!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: (Their voices are harmonizing.)

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: (It's more like a session than song writing.)

commands.speaker: Maki
commands.line: You want to play something? You could sing if you like, too.

commands.speaker: Rin
commands.line: Or you can shake some maracas with us.

commands.speaker: Hanayo
commands.line: You can dance with us, too!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Really? Don't mind if I do!

commands.speaker: Maki
commands.line: That's the spirit! Let's go!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: I've never done this before!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: (So this is how μ's writes their music? I don't think I understand it, but it's fun!)
